name: Wall Runner! (V 2.4)
description:
This is a fast pace platforming game with unique and challenging levels! Modern design and tons of game mechanics helps to make it a great gaming experience! Great for all styles of gamers, whether it is speed running or just wanting to casually play a game. 

Updates are always coming out so be sure to check back in for later versions. 

Donations are appreciated but the game is currently in a development phase hence it is free to play :D
